title: Starfield Station Break
shortDescription: Sneak through sunrise-lit docking bays to free the crew before lockdown.
longDescription: A covert dawn extraction beneath the capital's transit station. Follow beacon clues, disable holo-decoys, and guide the shuttle pilots out before the shutters seal for the day.
